location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Hornby et al (full names obscured, includes Nathaniel Stackhouse, Daniel Draper, Andrew Ramsay, William …, John Car…).

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with a large section of text missing in its top right corner.

mods.abstract: Acknowledges receipt of letters from Bushire and explains that the Eagle Snowhas arrived to collect intelligence on the situation there. Shipped by the Eagle Snow.
